import React, { useState } from 'react' import "./Contact.css" import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button'; import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; const Contact = () => { const [inputvalue, setInputvalue] = useState({ fname: "", lname: "", email: "", mobile: "", message: "", }) console.log(object); const getvalue = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setInputvalue(() => { return { ...inputvalue, [name]: value } }) } return ( <>

Contact Us

Fname Lname Email Mobile Message
) } export default Contact
